definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: By means of comparative analysis in order, this paper puts special emphasis on clarifying their dual characteristic.
sentences.chinese: 本文将通过逐项对比分析，着重阐明二者的对偶性。

sentences.english: Every problem has a dual equivalent.
There exists a strong duality between Z_(ind) and the indefinite admittance matrix Y_(ind).
sentences.chinese: 不定阻抗矩阵和不定导纳矩阵之间有着很强的对偶性。

sentences.english: Further, in this paper the sufficient and necessary condition for the duality of this linear invertible transform is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 得出了这类线性可逆变换存在对偶性的充分必要条件。

sentences.english: The duality conditions for multiobjective semi-infinite programming with semilocally convex functions are given.
sentences.chinese: 研究半局部凸函数在多目标半无限规划下的对偶性。

sentences.english: Weak duality theorem is established under generalized convexity conditions.
sentences.chinese: 在广义凸性条件下，建立了弱对偶性定理。

definition: cohomology (invariant of a topological space in math.)

pinyin: liang4 zi3 se4 dong4 li4 xue2

definition: the Higgs mechanism, explaining the mass of elementary particles in the Standard Model
